quests.name: The Secrets of Eternity Isle
objectives: Use the Mysterious Device in the corner of the Plaza to talk to Jafar.
Complete "The Port of Many Worlds" Quest to proceed to Eternity Isle.
Go to the Stardust Port in the Dream Castle.
Interact with the Ancient Vessel to travel to Eternity Isle.

Welcome to Eternity Isle!
  ‧ Find the Hologram Station that will allow you to speak to Jafar.
Interact with the Hologram Station to talk to Jafar.

Reach the Ancient Gate that leads deeper into Eternity Isle.
  ‧ Clear away the Splinters of Fate by approaching them
Talk to Jafar using the Hologram Station beside the Ancient Gate.
Find the pieces of the Ancient Sphere as you explore Ancient's Landing.
Repair the Ancient Sphere at a Crafting Station.
Put the Ancient Sphere in the receptacle next to the Ancient Gate.
Open the Ancient Gate.
Go deeper into Eternity Isle.
Meet Jafar by the broken bridge in the Courtyard area.
Talk to Jafar at the Hologram Station.

quests.name: The Flying Metal Nuisance
objectives: Search for the "flying metal nuisance" to get the Royal Hourglass.
Talk to the "flying metal nuisance."
Talk to Jafar at one of the Hologram Stations around Ancient's Landing.
Go inside EVE's House in Ancient's Landing.
Remove the Piles of Junk inside EVE's House to find a clue.
Pick up the paper on the ground.
Return to Jafar at one of the Hologram Stations around Ancient's Landing.
Look for the hidden area shown in the Memory.
Search for both parts of the Robot Costume in the secret area behind the waterfall.

Dress up using the items you found in the hidden area:
  ‧ Robot Hat.
  ‧ Robot Costume.
Talk to EVE while wearing the Robot Hat and Robot Costume.
Investigate the Best Fish Forever Recipe in your Inventory.
Unlock Goofy's Stall in Ancient's Landing.
(Find the broken half Goofy's Stall Sign in Ancient's Landing, then complete the "Give Me a Sign" Quest.)

Gather the following items from Ancient's Landing to make the recipe:
  ‧ 1 Robot Fish.
  ‧ 1 Cumin. (Some of the white flowers around here might be cumin...)
  ‧ 1 Celery.
  ‧ 1 Sea Snail.
Cook the Best Fish Forever for EVE.
Make sure the Best Fish Forever is in your Inventory.
Bring the food to EVE.
Pick up the Royal Hourglass.
Return to the Broken Bridge.
Talk to Jafar at the Hologram Station.
rewards: Royal Hourglass Upgrade (Remove Small Swirling Sands)

quests.name: The Sands in the Hourglass
objectives: Reach the Secluded Beach down the passage to the right of the broken bridge.
Talk to Jafar at the Hologram Station.

Use your Hourglass to search the Secluded Beach for what you need to repair the Statue:
  ‧ 2 Ancient Statue Fragment.

Use your Hourglass to search for more materials lost in time around Ancient's Landing:
  ‧ 3 Ancient Plate.
Return to Jafar on the Secluded Beach.
Talk to Jafar.
Use the Detailed Statue-Repair Instructions in your Inventory.
Craft the Statue's Arm at a Timebending Table.
Put the Statue's Arm back in its socket.
Return to the broken bridge in the Courtyard area.
Return to Jafar.
Search for Mist with your Hourglass, or access the Dreamlight menu and investigate your new Mist Duties
Repair the broken bridge in the Courtyard area by using Mist.

quests.name: Your Eternal Reward
objectives:
Find the remaining two Jewels of Time by investigating:
  ‧ The Wild Tangle.
  ‧ The Glittering Dunes.
Talk to Jafar at a Hologram Station.

Unlock the Borderlands in the Glittering Dunes to reach the palace.
  ‧ Search for Mist with your Hourglass, or access the Dreamlight menu and investigate your new Mist Duties
Interact with the Time Anomaly in front of the door to Jafar's Palace.
Talk to Jafar.

Jafar has vanished. But you get the feeling he'll be back...
  ‧ Talk to Merlin.
